sourcesContent:
Login
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html' }) export class LoginComponent { user!: IUser; users: IUser[] = []; username: string = ''; password: string = ''; flag: boolean = false; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get('https://localhost:7158/user').subscribe(result => { this.users = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } public login() { console.log('working...', this.users); console.log('entries: ', this.username, this.password); } } interface IUser { username: string; password: number; }
